metadata.title: CVE-2019-9752 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 5.x before5.0.34, 6.x before 6.0.16, and 7.x before 7.0.4. An attacker who is loggedinto OTRS as an agent or a customer user may upload a carefully craftedresource in order to cause execution of JavaScript in the context of OTRS.This is related to Content-type mishandling inKernel/Modules/PictureUpload.pm.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
